description: Change the documentation in function definition
oldCode:
# Description
#
# +x - Parameter Description
# +y - Parameter Description
# + return - Return value Description
public function add(int x , int y ) returns int {}
newCode:
# Description
#
# +x - x is a int
# +y - y is a int
# + return - Return as int
public function add(int x , int y ) returns int {}
